column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2020
column14: After not being able to find liquid Dial anti-bacterial soap (probably due to COVID-19), I was happy to find it in bars and order it. I actually don't mind bar soap at all.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
column14: My Mom would only buy this when I was a kid due to our dairy & vet tech type of work we did. I always have a bar of this in the house. Due to COVID type hording no one had this in stock locally for 3 months and we are using a lot more soap(among other things) at home then usual due to being home so muc.h.  I got this form the internet due to empty store shelves, i was concerned what i would get based on the other reviews.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2021
column14: The Dial Gold bar has been a staple in my household from a child. Now as an adult I still by the bar of soap along with a liquid soap.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2020
column14: I have tried most soap brands and I have to say that this by far wins in how clean and moisturized your skin will feel. I remember using this for the first time before I had surgery. The Doctor told me that I had to use this soap before my operation. I was very impressed with the big difference that it made and how clean I really felt.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
column14: At least you can find this still available in the stores.  The bar soap selection these days is skimpy. Dial for men bar soap was the best, but now tgat they don't make that we have to resort to the bar soap made for most everyone but not specifically for men.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2021
column14: I struck it rich with GOLD ! My doctor suggested this soap to treat a rash. Evidently it has some medicinal qualities. Since she has more degrees than a thermometer, I trust her judgement. Being a spokesman for the under-educated, I can only tell you about my experience. It suds up pretty easy & it smells great! I highly recommend this product. Discover GOLD for yourself !

column6: Anti-bacterial soap--Not just for your body.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2021
column14: Dial's been around for years and I've yet to find anything I like better.  The scent isn't overwhelming and it does what soap is supposed to do. Soap lifts dirt and rinsing washes it away.  I like the bars because when I come across a stain in something I'm hand washing, grabbing my bar of dial and using it on the stain, I can usually get anything clean.

column6: Never Thought I Could Dislike Basic Soap So Much
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
column14: Bought this during the early start of the Pandemic.  I find the soap cracks lengthwise very quickly.  The other very odd aspect is it retains dirt!  The dirt clings to the soap - hold it under water and it doesn't rinse away!  No grease, nor anything unusual but when the soap is used as hand soap, the soap holds on to the dirt, doesn't rinse off, and looks disgusting.  I wld only purchase this as an absolute emergency with no other soap under the sun available.
